entry.title: 3M AP111-5GAL - Adhesion Promoter 111 5 Gallon 7000049700
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Adhesion Promoters
Price: 682.16

[shortdesc]

3M Adhesion Promoter, 111, 5 gallon

  • 3M™ Adhesion Promoter 111 is a fast-acting, isopropyl alcohol based solution designed to promote better and faster adhesion of 3M™ VHB™ Tapes
  • This product works particularly well for adhering 3M™ VHB™ Tapes to high surface energy substrates like galvanized steel, bare metals, and painted surfaces.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Color Clear
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Adhesion Promoters
    Volume 5 Gallon, 18.9 L

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ Adhesion Promoter 111 is an isopropyl alcohol based solution used to promote better and faster adhesion of 3M™ VHB™ Tapes to various surfaces including bare metals, galvanized steel, and painted surfaces
  • Since surfaces and paint formulations vary con

    • Product Information

  • Increases bond strength on surfaces that are traditionally difficult to adhere, such as paint and metal
  • Isopropyl alcohol based solvent system dries very quickly while producing a non-offensive odour
  • Increased build rate at both normal and cooler temperatures
  • Acts as a bonding primer in certain applications to clean and promote adhesion in a single step, saving time and effort

    • Suggested Application

  • Helps promote faster adhesion of 3M™ VHB™ Tapes to various surfaces
    		•

entry.title: 3M 86A-PRIMER-PINT - Adhesion Promoter 86A Transparent Liquid (1 Pint) 7000002051
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Adhesion Promoters
Price: 81.06

[shortdesc]

3M Adhesion Promoter, 86A, transparent liquid, 1 pint

  • 3M™ Adhesion Promoter 86A is a liquid primer designed to be used with 3M™ Polyurethane Protective Tapes and other acrylic adhesives to enhance initial adhesion in demanding situations.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Color Clear
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Adhesion Promoters
    Volume 1 Pint, 2.85 L

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ Adhesion Promoter 86A is designed to promote faster adhesion of 3M™ Polyurethane Protective Tapes with acrylic adhesives to certain types of surfaces, such as polyurethane paint, epoxy primers, or epoxy composites
  • It is not intended for use where the

    • Product Information

  • Promotes fast ultimate adhesion
  • Ideal for surfaces such as polyurethane paint, epoxy primers and epoxy composites
  • Companion product for use with paint replacement film technologies

    • Suggested Application

  • Polyurethane paint, epoxy primers, or epoxy composites
